data.name: Run and Fire - Starter Pack
data.detailed_description:
You can find essential beginner items in this pack.
You will get iconic AK-47 assault rifle with modified clip size and unique paintwork, money + experience booster for 3 days and two types of currency which can be used in the in-game store.

Pack contents:

  • AK-47 "Белый тигр S".
    Elite modification of AK-47 by the black market's finest custom engineers. Unique paintwork gives perfect first impression, but there is more to it than meets the eye: lowered recoil and increased clip definitely make some difference.

  • Double booster (3 days)
    Powerful booster increasing the amount of received money and experience up to 50%.
  • 10 GXP
    Premium currency you can spend on buying premium goods in the in-game shop.
  • 10000 Credits
    In-game currency for buying non-premium in-game shop items.

In order to recieve DLC items, you need to log into the game, choose "Награды" menu option and press "Забрать" button next to each item.
In order to equip or activate DLC items you need to access "Оружейная" menu option after joining one of the game channels.

data.short_description: Iconic AK-47 assault rifle with modified clip size and unique paintwork, money + experience booster for 3 days and two types of currency which can be used in the in-game store.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, VISTA, Windows7, Windows8
  • Processor: Dual Core or better
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce7600, Radeon3850 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows7, Windows8
  • Processor: Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 450
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard

package_groups.title: Buy Run and Fire - Starter Pack
